instructions_to_main_agent: Add the custom fonts to index.css via @import.
Configure tailwind.config.js to include the custom 'orange' primary palette.
Implement the 'Three-Pane' layout for the Inbox page specifically.
Ensure 'DLT' related terms (Entity ID, Template ID) are present in the SMS/Template forms.
Use the provided image URLs for the landing page. Do not use placeholders.
Interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Do not use gradients for text. Keep text high-contrast.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (e.g., transition: all).
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
